title: What are some melodious Tamil songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maalai neram — aayirathil oruvan  Poove sempoove — solla thudikudhu manasu  Iru vizhi unadhu — minnale  Sonalum ketpadhilai — Kadhal virus  Azhagu nilave — pavithra  Innum konja neram — mariyaan  Nenjikule — kadal  Medhuvaagathan — kochchadaiyaan  Yaarum illa thani arangil — kaaviya thalaivan  Vaan varuvaan — kaatru veliyidai  I think I should stop here. My list is too long :P Thank you Simbu Arasan. :)

kanmani - guna sundari kannal - Thalapathi Kanne Kalaimaane-Moondram Pirai Nee Partha - hey ram Un Perai Sonnale - dum dum dum Nadhiye Nadhiy-Rhythm Un Sirippinil -Pachaikili Muthucharam Snehithane Snehithane -Alaipayuthey Annal Mele Panithuli,Nenjukkul Peidhidum-Vaaranam Aayiram nenjorathil- pichaikaaran
